mapper.sql:
FROM oyCodeGroup
WHERE 1=1
AND oycgDelNy = 1 AND oycgDelNy = 0
AND oycgName LIKE concat('%',#{scOycgName},'%')
AND oycgName LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%') AND oycgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{scValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT oycgSeq , oycgName , oycgNameEng , oycgDelNy
ORDER BY oycgSeq DESC limit #{startRnumForMysql}, #{rowNumToShow}
SELECT oycgSeq , oycgName , oycgDelNy FROM oyCodeGroup WHERE 1=1 AND oycgDelNy = 0 AND oycgSeq = #{oycgSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE oyCodeGroup SET oycgDelNy = 1 WHERE 1=1 AND oycgSeq = #{oycgSeq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM oyCodeGroup WHERE 1=1 AND oycgSeq = #{oycgSeq}
